body_html:
Hi @abdelrahmanmohamed. There are a couple of community supported OpenCL efforts, but nothing officially supported:

  • https://jonnoftw.github.io/2018/04/04/building-tensorflow-with-opencl-support-on-ubuntu-1604

  • https://github.com/hughperkins/tf-coriander

  • https://www.codeplay.com/portal/tensorflow%E2%84%A2-for-opencl%E2%84%A2-using-sycl%E2%84%A2
body_text:
Hi @abdelrahmanmohamed. There are a couple of community supported OpenCL efforts, but nothing officially supported:


https://jonnoftw.github.io/2018/04/04/building-tensorflow-with-opencl-support-on-ubuntu-1604


https://github.com/hughperkins/tf-coriander


https://www.codeplay.com/portal/tensorflow%E2%84%A2-for-opencl%E2%84%A2-using-sycl%E2%84%A2
body:
Hi @abdelrahmanmohamed. There are a couple of community supported OpenCL efforts, but nothing officially supported:

- https://jonnoftw.github.io/2018/04/04/building-tensorflow-with-opencl-support-on-ubuntu-1604

- https://github.com/hughperkins/tf-coriander

- https://www.codeplay.com/portal/tensorflow%E2%84%A2-for-opencl%E2%84%A2-using-sycl%E2%84%A2
